Protect your property. Intellectual, technological or electronic.
We help
Yes, please

What do you get?

legal advice tailored your business needs.

What

Legal United provides legal services and consultancy in intellectual property law and internet law. Especially when it comes to research, technological and legal development and International dynamics, Legal United combines these multiple factors in order to give a clear understanding of the situation at hand.

Why

An intrinsic approach in (International) intellectual- and internet law is what drives Legal United. Looking at the bigger picture while understanding the issues at hand, matters are innately mannered creating a thorough yet practical and, when needed, strategical advice.

When

Are you a small business or start up looking for practical or legal advice? Is your practice or law firm in need of (temporarily) extra help? Legal United provides hands on legal work when you are looking for flexible legal work, whether it's about research, advice, practical decisions or thorough feedback.

About

Why we're qualified to help you.

  • A qualified lawyer with a passion for learning

    Legal United has worked with start ups, small law firms, independant professionals and retail on matters of copyright, contract law, internet law and trademark law. From researching the legal parameters to creating and fine-tuning creative concepts, Legal United focusses on the individual matter.

  • March 2015

    An Agency is Born

    Jantine has started Legal United in March 2015 and is known for her personal and open approach, conducting the bigger picture into the smaller issue. She enjoys working in an International environment and feels at home in groups yet likes to work independantly as well.

  • In the heart of Amsterdam

    You'll find legal united in the centre of Amsterdam, The Netherlands.

info@legal-united.com

We're happy to discuss and understand your business needs.
